title: Even If It’s Not Love - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Crime   Criminals   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Love Interests   Evil Organizations   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Loneliness   Modern Day   Organized Crime   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   R-18   Revenge   Tragic Past
author: Seo Hyeeun   서혜은
description:
Sin Woo-hyun – The third head of a syndicate, living his life through inertia. He visits the older sister of the man who drove his younger sister to her death and meets Yoo-hwa there.

Kim Yoo-hwa – A life full of wounds. She meets Woo-hyun while in deep loneliness and loves him.

Even if it’s not love,

Even if you don’t mean it,

It’s all right.

Because it’s you.

Because you were affectionate to me, who was hungry for affection.>
